root.data_types['CardData']['Ecto-Charge.new_value: Play: Forge a key at +20A current cost, reduced by 1A for each card in your discard pile (to a minimum of 6). If you do, purge Ecto-Charge.

root.data_types['CardData']['Nizak, The.new_value:
While fighting, Nizak, The Forgotten gains [[Invulnerable|invulnerable]]. (It [[Cannot_vs_Must|cannot]] be destroyed or dealt damage.)

After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Nizak, The Forgotten, return that creature to its owner’s hand.
